name: Airships and Trains Tilesets
description:
This collection of 8 tile sheets features lots of airships, planes, trains, and similarly themed objects. 

Tiles are 48x48px and the tilesets are formatted for ready use in RPG Maker MV. No parallax mapping required. With purchase, you may use these tiles in any project, and may edit the tiles as needed for use in your projects.  





TERMS OF USE:

● With purchase, you may use these tilesets in any project, commercial or non-commercial, provided that Starbird Resources is credited. They may be used in any game engine.

● You are NOT permitted to redistribute these tilesets except as packaged in your game or project. 

● You are NOT permitted to post these tilesets on any other board or website without express written permission from Starbird. This includes "Best Of" collections and similar.  

If you have any questions, please reach out  and I'll do my best to get you an answer quickly.
